job_description:
• Responsible for analyzing data from our wearable healthtech  devices and developing analytic algorithms.
• The role will be based in Hong Kong and will involve working closely with our product and software development teams to ensure the timely delivery of high -quality data analysis and algorithms.
• Self-motivated  and driven individuals who are passionate about computer vision and data science and wearable device development, and are willing to work for a start -up company in a Work-Life balance environment.

Job Requirement:
• Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or related fields.
• Strong programming skills in Python and experience with data analysis libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.
• Experience with converting Matlab algorithms to Python code.
• Knowledge of com puter vision and motion data analysis algorithms.
• Familiarity with machine learning algorithms and techniques
cover letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Data Analyst at AI Mnemonic Limited. As a data science student with hands-on experience in AI development, data analytics, and software engineering, I am eager to bring my technical expertise and problem-solving mindset to your team.

My experience spans across AI-driven projects and data analytics roles. During my internship at Resume Page Limited, I developed an AI-powered profile chatbot using Llama and MySQL, improving user engagement by 35%. I also engineered a business card scanner with face recognition, streamlining information exchange by 30%. My prior data analyst internship at IESHER involved analyzing World Bank data to identify policy insights, reinforcing my ability to extract meaningful narratives from complex datasets.

Beyond technical expertise, I am passionate about building impactful solutions. My recent smart fridge platform, developed for a hackathon, integrates inventory tracking with AI-powered recipe recommendations and shopping list generation—demonstrating my ability to merge AI with real-world applications. My leadership experience in tutoring and mentoring has further sharpened my communication and collaboration skills.

I am eager to contribute my analytical skills and AI-driven mindset to AI Mnemonic Limited. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your team’s goals. Thank you for your time, and I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Christopher Otniel Eleazar

job_description:
As a Digital Marketing Associate, you will play a crucial role in our marketing efforts, focusing on planning and designing the project’s social media marketing, SEO research and analysis as well as marketing executions. The role will also be supporting the company’s in -person marketing campaign for clients when and if necessary. This position offers a unique opportunity to gain hands -on experience in the tech aspects of marketing, working closely with our experienced team.  

• Social Media Marketing: Assist in planning, creating, scheduling and analyzing content across various social media platforms to increase engagement and brand awareness; if necessary, running ads on platforms like Instagram, Facebook and LinkedIn  
• SEO (Sea rch Engine Optimization) Research and Analysis: Conduct keyword research, analyze website traffic, and provide insights to improve our search engine rankings to drive organic traffic  
• Content Creation: Collaborate with the founders to develop compelling c ontent for social media, email marketing and other digital channels  
• Data Analysis: Using tools like Google Analytics to track and analyze website traffic, user behavior, and campaign performance  
• Marketing Automation: Using tools to automate marketing t asks and workflows  
• Graphic and Video Design: Creating visual content and short videos using Canva and/or Adobe Photoshop or any other similar applications - Market Research: Stay up -to-date with social medica trends and activities to create appealing con tent to improve engagement  

Job Requirements:  
• Familiarity with social media platforms and a basic understanding of digital marketing tools.  
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both English and Chinese.  
• Strong analytical mindset with th e ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.  
• Self-motivated, detail -oriented, and capable of working independently as well as collaboratively within a team.  
• A background or experience in design is a plus.

job_description:
• Partner closely with the Project Manager, Business Analysts, and stakeholders to gather, analyze, and comprehend detailed business requirements.
• Translate complex business needs into effective, user -friendly software solutions by leveraging best practices in soft ware engineering.
• Write clean, efficient, and well -documented code while adhering to industry standards and the organization's coding guidelines.
• Conduct thorough unit testing and debugging to ensure high -quality, bug -free software deliverables. Identify a nd resolve complex technical issues by employing innovative problem -solving techniques.
• Contribute to the continued enhancement and evolution of the organization's software products.
• Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of software designs, code , and processes to facilitate seamless collaboration and future enhancements.

Job Requirements:
• Strong proficiency in software development, with hands-on experience in one or more programming languag es (e.g., C#, ASP.NET, JavaScript, TypeScript)
• Proven experience in MSSQL application development, including database design, optimization, and integration with .NET applications
• Demonstrated experience in the full software development life cycle (SDLC), including requirements gathering, design, development, testing, and deployment
• Excellent analytical and problem -solving skills, with the ability to translate complex business requirements into functional software
• Demonstrated experience in writing clean, ef ficient, and well -documented code
• Proven track record of successful software testing and debugging
• Familiarity with Agile software development methodologies

job_description:
Job Description:
• Responsible for the research and data development pipeline from data extraction, blending, cleansing, and processing to model creation and result visualization.
• Research, evaluate and implement different deep-learning algorithms .
• Monitoring the progress of image recognition and image processing .
• Research, design, develop, document, test and debug applications software and systems that contain logical and mathe matical solutions.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deploy machine learning algorithms for testing and production systems.

Job Requirements:
• Major in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics or a related discipline
• At least one year of experience with machine learning, deep learning, or artificial intelligence
• Solid experience in Python, and Machine Learning libraries: Tensorflow/ PyTorch
• Knowledge of Java is highly preferred
• Able to work in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment
• Team Player with good communication skills in English
• Self-Organized, good problem-solving skills and willing to learn

job_description:

• 学习有关组织架构，物料主数据，供货商三个板块于  SPRO对应的的配置事务代码 (T-code)。
• 了解  Karrie 于 SAP 的订货 ,采购，入库，发票校验等流程，并实操练相关的事务。
• 参与关于订货宝对接  SAP 的会议 ,了解并记录会议相关内容。知悉各部门的协作沟通的方式，并且通过会议内容进一步提升对  SAP 于实际开发业务中的作用和定位。

Job Requirements
• Excellent communication skills, planning and organization skills.
• Strong leadership, presentation skills, problem solving skills and opened mind .
• Strong sense of team work, responsible and proactive character.
• Proficient  in MS Office applications. (Excel, Access, PowerPoint, etc)

job_description:
**Project Participation**:  
• Collaborate with the engineering team on various projects, such as product 
 design, prototyping, and testing.  
• Assist in the development and implementation of engineering solutions to 
 address client/company needs.  
• Participate in project meetings, brainstorming sessions, and design reviews.  
• Contribute to the documentation and reporting of project progress and findings.  

**Technical Skills Development**:  
• Apply your knowledge of engineering principles, including but not limited to 
mechanical, electrical, software, or civil engineering.  
• Gain experience in the use of engineering software, tools, and equipment.  
• Familiarize yourself with industry -standard de sign, analysis, and simulation 
techniques.  
• Enhance your problem -solving and critical thinking skills through hands -on 
problem -solving exercises.   

**Learning and Continuous Improvement**:  
• Attend training sessions, workshops, and seminars to expand you r technical 
and professional knowledge.  
• Seek feedback from mentors and supervisors to identify areas for growth and 
improvement.  
• Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in the 
STEM field.  
• Contribute to the continuous improvement of processes and practices within the 
organization.  

**Job Requirements**:  
• Problem -solving and Critical Thinking: Exhibit strong problem -solving, 
analytical, and critical thinking skills to tackle complex engineering 
challenges.  
• Communication Skill s: Possess effective written and verbal communication 
skills to collaborate with team members and present technical information to 
stakeholders.  
• Teamwork and Collaboration: Demonstrate the ability to work effectively in a 
team environment and contribute to  group projects.  
• Enthusiasm and Willingness to Learn: Show a genuine interest in the 
engineering field and a willingness to learn new skills and technologies.  
• Time Management and Organization: Exhibit strong time management and 
organizational skills to mee t deadlines and manage multiple tasks 
simultaneously.  
• Safety Awareness: Understand and adhere to safety protocols and regulations 
relevant to the engineering discipline.
